full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE DUPLICATE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (To accompany 343688 monthly report on Form N-4) PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION No. To the Honorable U.S. District Court, Los Angeles, Calif. The Court of at 316a This petition for naturalization, hereby made and filed under section Immigration and Nationality Act, respectfully shows: YUK WONG (1) My full, true, and correct name is 1027 Moraga Dr., (Full. true name. without abbreviation) (2) My present place of residence is Los Angeles, LA, Calif. 90049 street) (City or town) (County) 6-9-15 (State) (ZIP Code) (3) I was born on in (Month) (Day) Fukin; China (City or town) not (County district prono or State) (Country) (4) I am married, and have living children. 12-4-67 (5) I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on 19 and have not abandoned such residence. China A17 212 360 ca (6) My present nationality is ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. (7) I have not heretofore made a petition for naturalization. none (8) I pray that my name be changed to (continued over) AFFIDAVIT OF WITNESSES The following witnesses, each being severally, duly, and respectively sworn, depose and say: William H. Allen (1) My name is 5630 Harcross Dr., LA, Calif. I reside at and (Number and atre Lewis W. Stunston (City or town) (State) (2) My name is 1027 Moraga Dr., LA, Calif. I reside at (Number and street) (City or town) (State) I am a citizen of the United States of America; I have personally known and have been acquainted in the United States with the petitioner named 6-1-68 in the petition for naturalization of which this affidavit is a part, since at least ; to my personal knowledge, based upon (Month) (Day) (Year) frequent observations and personal contacts with the petitioner within the State(s) of residence of the petitioner since said date, the petitioner has resided, imme- diately preceding the date of filing this petition, in the United States continuously since the date last mentioned; that the petitioner has been physically present 31 in the United States for at least months of that period; and that petitioner has been a resident in the State in which the petition is filed during at least the last 6 months. I have personal knowledge that the petitioner is, and during all such periods has been a person of good moral character, attached to the principles of the Constitution of the United States, and well disposed to the good order and happiness of the United States, and in my opinion the petitioner is in every way quali- fied to be admitted a citizen of the United States. I do swear (affirm) that the statements of fact I have made in the affidavit to this petition for naturalization subscribed by me are true to the best of my Knowledge and belief: so HELP ME GOD. William H.Kleen (Signature of Witness) Junior (Signature of Witness) WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY CLERK OR DEPUTY WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY DESIGNATED EXAMINER CLERK OF COURT Subscribed and swornato (affirmed) before me by above-named peti- Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me by above-named peti- tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oath shown in said petition tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oath shown in said petition and affidavit. and filed by said petitioner, in the office of the clerk of said and affidavit at U.S. this Los Angeles, Calif. By at this day of Deputy Clerk. A.D. 19 [SEAL] Clerk. By Deputy Clerk. Form N-405 (Rev. 7-1-70)
